channel.title: Brandon Boswell
channel.description: Recent content from Brandon Boswell's Digital Garden

item.title: Death Stranding
item.description: According to HowLongToBeat it takes 40.5 hours, and I am 16.75 hours in. References

item.title: Control
item.description: According to HowLongToBeat it takes 11.5 hours (13 hours on Ultimate Edition) to beat, and I am 10.3 hours in. I should go ahead and finish it. References

item.title: Forza Horizon 5
item.description: A ton of fun, but we never ended up picking it up as a friend group and playing the single player piece at the computer is not as fun as it would be in the living room....

item.title: PHOGS!
item.description: Played with Charlie Boswell Put down with Xbox Game Pass ended References

item.title: Dominion
item.description: Board Games Dominion Recommended by Jake Keneally Fantastic. One of my favorite card games ever

item.title: Pandemic
item.description: Pandemic Recommended by Jake Played it. It’s only okay. It’s basically a Forbidden Island for adults

item.title: Harry Potter Hogwart's Battle
item.description: Board Games Harry Potter Hogwarts Battle Pros Simple Easy to Pick Up The location counters changing the difficulty feels really cool (Basically becomes different phases of the game) Cons...

item.title: Betrayal at house on the hill
